tool_description: The IEX API is a is a free, web-based API supplying IEX quoting and trading data.
name: Investors Exchange (IEX) Trading
title: Investors Exchange (IEX) Trading

api_list.name: IEX Short Interest List
api_list.description: Consolidated market short interest positions in all IEX-listed securities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com/stock/GOOG/short-interest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com/stock/{symbol}/short-interest"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: IEX Regulation SHO Threshold Securities List
api_list.description: IEX-listed securities that have an aggregate fail to deliver position for five consecutive settlement days at a registered clearing agency, totaling 10,000 shares or more and equal to at least 0.5% of the issuer’s total shares outstanding (i.e., “threshold securities”).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com/stock/NVDA/threshold-securities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Effective Spread
api_list.description: Returns an array of effective spread, eligible volume, and price improvement of a stock, by market.
api_list.code:

url = "https://investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com/stock/msft/effective-spread"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: OHLC
api_list.description: Returns the official open and close for a give symbol.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Specify stock symbol or use "market" for market-wide information

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com/stock/qcom/ohlc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "investors-exchange-iex-trading.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Book
